extendedInfo.description: The weight loss revolution. The patented scientific innovation. Cortisol is what makes you fat. Lose weight and fat by reducing your cortisol - level. Now you can lose weight without diet and diet pills and build skeletal muscle mass without exercise.And "The Weight Loss Alarm Clock" wakes you with a wonderful relaxing gentle friendly Tibetan alarm tone. New scientific studies give clear evidence that your morning alarm clock induced stress can affect your blood - cortisol, your weight, your skeletal muscle mass and your health. Even the wake-up call of a conventional alarm clock puts your body under unhealthy stress and a cortisol - peak, resulting in weight gain. The ring tone of conventional alarm clock apps will cause serious health problems. Researchers have linked the morning hours to a higher incident of heart attacks and strokes. Higher levels of cortisol in the bloodstream have been shown to have negative effects, such as: weight gain, depression, pain, suppressed thyroid function, blood sugar imbalances, decreased bone density, skeletal muscle wasting, high blood pressure, lowered immunity, impaired erectile function, menstrual abnormalities, fatigue, chronic pain, headache, migraine, fibromyalgia, muscle pain, poor digestion, oily skin, acne and eczema. Elevated cortisol also leads to wrinkles, sagging, and impaired wound healing. Elevated cortisol in pregnant mothers influences cortisol metabolism during the baby's crucial development periods. Cortisol is what makes us fat, so installing and using this app could be a good idea.Developed by a neuro-scientist, our breakthrough application will redefine the way that you wake-up from your sleep and lose fat and weight. Every night, this app calibrates itself, itâs constantly working whilst you sleep to fine-tune your alarm. You can not make mistakes when you`re using this app. The gentle Weight Loss Alarm Clock removes your morning - stress by waking you up gentle and soft at the most suitable time according to your sleep pattern. The Weight Loss Alarm Clock is a new generation sleep cycle alarm clcok that requires no sensors (worldwide first sensor free sleep cycle alarm clock), in-fact, all you need is your phone by the side of your bed and the alarm clock shall be used conventionally. This innovative, 21st century alarm clock is constantly re-adjusting to your personal sleep habits, looking for the smallest details which it integrates into itâs complex algorithm that it simply uses your sleep information to customize your âwake-upâ experience. The more you use the application, the more accurate it becomes. Connect your phone to power, set the alarm and activate the application - you will feel results on the first morning. Slide your finger across the glass to deactivate the alarm in the morning. A new scientific study (National Research Centre, Denmark) shows that even the wake-up call of a conventional alarm clock puts our body under unhealthy stress and Cortisol. The concentration of the unhealthy stress hormone Cortisol is more than double compared to when you wake up by yourself.In fact, a Yale University study showed that even otherwise - slim persons who are under high stress levels are prone to put on weight on around their abdominal area. Cortisol has been proven to encourage fat storage in the abdominal area. The worst part is if we don't alleviate stress, cortisol levels stay high even when the origin al source of stress has subsided. The effects of cortisol will cause even more fatty deposits to find their way to your middle even when the stress seems to have passed. Obese persons have significantly higher urinary free cortisol excretion.Obese, overweight, corpulent, heavy, huge, outsize?The Weight Loss and Fat loss Alarm Clock is the best way to wake up and the most natural way to eradicate stress, to lose weight, to improve fertility and erectile function and more just simply by starting your day gently - at the best time.

reviews.title: Ok, but
reviews.comment: It could use other options for alarm sounds and a snooze button. Not sure if it\'s adapting to anything...seems to always go off 20 min before my alarm time, no matter when I go to sleep. Trying to give it a chance, even resetting it so it can \"adapt\" again, but not much luck.
reviews.author: Kimberly Haara Malcom

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Very nice alarm clock. Lots of cool features. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Batsaikhan Seded

reviews.title: Best alarm clock I have ever got
reviews.comment: It is waking me up every morning very gently by soft and gradual bell sound. It is amazing to have an alarm clock that can actually \"learn\" your wake up pattern. Bravo!
reviews.author: Marc Sir

reviews.title: Needs better user interface, more alarms and more options
reviews.comment: Please add an option to put only vibration without sound, if someone is sleeping in the room other than mr it would wake him up. Besides i always wake up on alarms with vibration only, no need for sound. And please add an option to put several alarms
reviews.author: Mahmoud Charif

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Works very well, Always on time. Feature packed alarm with a lot of customization options. I love it!
reviews.author: Allan James

reviews.title: I find this app both interesting and useful.
reviews.comment: I find the gradual and adapting alarm very effective, I wake up less groggy and the alarm is not loud and annoying enough to wake up my baby or my partner if he doesnt need to get up. I definitely recommend this app.
reviews.author: Darren Aronofsky

reviews.title: Finally it comes on Google Play
reviews.comment: I used it for 3 months on my iPad... a great app, really reduces my stress
reviews.author: Harry Lam

reviews.title: Awesome little app
reviews.comment: I didnt think this thing would work but was really impressed with it! Definitely wakes you at the right time and love that it tracks your sleep quality. What a wonderful and helpful tool!!
reviews.author: Laurie Jones

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: This app supposedly adapts to your sleep cycle so that it gently awakens you.  Each and every day I was awakened exactly 20 minutes before my alarm time. You would think the app would realize this and go off closer to my alarm time when it realized it was waking me up so quickly.  Nope. Even when it was completely \"adapted\"it always woke me up exactly 20 min early. And there is no snooze so you can forget laying back down.  Just did not work for me at all!  I do better with my phones installed alarm setup!
reviews.author: SJ Honeycutt

reviews.title: Easy work out
reviews.comment: The easiest way to get weight loss I have ever heard of. Feel happy already even before using. No harm to try anyway.
reviews.author: ENN Ngan

reviews.title: Feel Refreshed
reviews.comment: If you want to get up easier and feel refreshed every morning? This app can help you!
reviews.author: Sandip Singh

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Bought the app, and was generally satisfied until it stopped working after a week. I tried every night for the next 6 business days to get it working, but after two late arrivals and three more close calls at work, I\'m done. I need an alarm I can depend on, and this one fails miserably. Wonderful concept though.
reviews.author: Charlie Litton

reviews.title: I was waiting for this....
reviews.comment: I was waiting for this on android after using it on wife\'s iPad.
reviews.author: BYG BYG

reviews.title: Cut my weight
reviews.comment: Wake up better is such a commonly overlooked way in archiving a heathier live.
reviews.author: Vania CY

reviews.title: Improved my rest
reviews.comment: I\'m sleeping fewer hours but functioning better. Quite remarkable. $1 is a small price to pay for any improvement in sleep quality.
reviews.author: Julie jwel

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.comment: Well done, it\'s a rather remarkable concept and seemingly works so far. Highly recommended to give it a try. I bought it and I am very happy.
reviews.author: Jochen Da\'Cunha

reviews.title: It is so very easy to use and has a gentle sound
reviews.comment: The guy that made this app is an absolute genius. After getting the same amount of sleep I normally do I was wide awake instead of being groggy like usual. Works great !!
reviews.author: David Vuu

reviews.title: Great....
reviews.comment: A soft and stress - free awakening, a soft and gentle sound. A great work of art for sleep cycles !! It really helps a lot for my sleep quality thx
reviews.author: Kevin Lane

reviews.title: feeling lighter in days
reviews.comment: i heard that less stress in mind reduces cortisol..... then i found this app.... few days of use replacing my old clock. felt less stress and lighter mood. hope it will happen to my actual weight soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best sleep cycle alarm clock app ever.
reviews.comment: I tested a lot of \"sleep cycle alarm clock apps\", this is the best one.
reviews.author: Martin nortsted
